title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - 9/9/2015 & 10/9/2015
body:
On Wednesday 9th September and Thursday 10th September, starting at 04:00am AEST (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for planned maintenance on our network infrastructure.

On both days at 05:30am AEST (19:30 UTC), the Oceanic servers will be shut down, all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for approximately 4 hours.


** UPDATE: 10/9/2015 @ 0930am AEST** The second part of the maintenance is now complete.  We're going to keep Ranked offline for another 30 mins while we ensure everything is running smoothly.  Thanks for your patience folks!


** UPDATE: 9/9/2015 @ 1545pm AEST** TPG peering is back online, so everything should be back to normal for TPG players.

** UPDATE: 9/9/2015 @ 0900am AEST** The first part of the maintenance has been successfully completed and the server is back online.  We're on schedule for tomorrow for the second part.  
During the maintenance, we encountered an issue with our peering link to TPG - as a result, players on TPG may experience some issues with sub-optimal routing while we work with them to bring it back online.

Feel free to ask any questions you might have here.


Best Regards
Agent Mindstar

replies.body:
Hi folks,

We're back online now, but we'll keep Ranked offline for another 30 minutes while we make sure everything is running smoothly.

Thanks for your patience this last couple of mornings.

Mindstar

Cheers

I'm guessing you're in NZ like me? Look at the post below this and you'll understand. They aren't late, they just chose not to count NZ as anything again and do it in Australian time. Even though NZ time would've caused less upset and problems for both countries as the maintenance would have finished over an hour ago... Maybe this is sorta why the PM wants to change the flag, to get NZ slightly more noticed? Hope it works... Probs wont change things like this though unfortunately :(

then people would wonder why it was in NZ time when Australia has 20,434,176 people and NZ has 4,614,676 ALOT more people in Australia so it would go more noticed, maybe should of just done it sooner rather than change which time zone it goes by XD
Riot would rather have 4 million people complaining than 20 million. just kick back, im from NZ too..
you know there is more than one timezone in aus right?

When you complain about not being included in the times then say the whole of Australia and its 20 million people live in one timezone, gold. I live in Western Australia and I don't get noticed either, what a shame, rito plz
You could all just learn to minus or plus an hour or two. Better yet use an online clock for AEST -.-

This is not related to the PROJECT: skins.  They should be out once the maintenance (EDIT: on the 9th) is complete.

Well it says it will be down twice, so maybe they meant after the 9th maint we get them? which would mean we still get it on time.

This is correct (my bad for being unclear here) - the skins will be released for OCE per the global schedule - so same day as everyone else.  If OCE is down for maintenance at that time, we'll get them as soon as the server is up again.

Thanks for clarifying, I sort of misread it anyway. Also could you look into getting AM and PM back into the times in server downtime posts? I noticed they stopped awhile ago. I know its pretty self explanatory but its just quality of life improvements I guess.

in fact i think they're getting released on the beginning of the 9th? because if they were to be released **on the 8th** it would be at 00:00 in the morning. But it states [at the end of the time frame](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/3qXbIdqV) 

>PROJECT First Strike
Be among the first to unlock new PROJECT skins from 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT and show that you were part of the First Strike with permanent exclusive loading screen cards.

And with all being said it's now out for sale. Have a fun time playing with them :)
I got the alpha strike bundle for all the first strike borders :D
